name: Mean-Reverting Volatility
description: Volatility spikes revert quickly to long-term mean. Tests low persistence parameters and rapid mean reversion.

input.comment: Generated by generateGARCH_MeanReverting() - α+β=0.70, multiple volatility cycles

meanReversion.comment: Forecasts should converge rapidly to long-term variance

forecastBehavior.comment: 10-step forecast should show clear convergence to ω/(1-α-β)

notes: Low persistence (α+β≈0.70). Volatility shocks dissipate quickly. Forecasts converge rapidly to long-term variance = ω/(1-α-β). Contrast with GARCH-006 (high persistence).
